20110108024553.000|20110108024555.000|CC1|YOUNG TEETH ARE BEING MADE, WHEN
20110108024555.000|20110108024556.000|CC1|THOSE ADULT TEETH COME IN.      
20110108024556.000|20110108024558.000|CC1|SO IF YOU LOOK AT THE NORMAL    
20110108024558.000|20110108024600.000|CC1|TEETH ON THE LEFT, YOU CAN SEE  
20110108024600.000|20110108024602.000|CC1|NORMAL COLORATION.              
20110108024602.000|20110108024604.000|CC1|BUT THAT STREAKING AND          
20110108024604.000|20110108024605.000|CC1|SPLOTCHING ON THE MODERATE SIDE,
20110108024605.000|20110108024607.000|CC1|THAT'S A MILD CASE OF FLUOROSIS,
20110108024607.000|20110108024608.000|CC1|AND THAT'S WHAT HAS PEOPLE      
20110108024608.000|20110108024609.000|CC1|CONCERNED.                      
20110108024609.000|20110108024611.000|CC1|WE'VE SEEN AN INCREASE OF THAT  
20110108024611.000|20110108024612.000|CC1|SINCE THE '60s.                 
20110108024612.000|20110108024613.000|CC1|NOW, TWO OUT OF FIVE HAVE THE   
20110108024613.000|20110108024616.000|CC1|PROBLEM.                        
20110108024616.000|20110108024619.000|CC1|IN 2004, OUR MOST RECENT DATA,  
20110108024619.000|20110108024622.000|CC1|IT'S UP TO 41% OF TEENAGERS     
20110108024622.000|20110108024623.000|CC1|HAVING THE PROBLEM, UP FROM 23% 
20110108024623.000|20110108024625.000|CC1|IN THE LATE '80s AND THAT'S THE 
20110108024625.000|20110108024626.000|CC1|CONCERN RIGHT NOW.              
20110108024626.000|20110108024628.000|CC1|>> WHAT ARE THE OTHER FACTORS AT
20110108024628.000|20110108024629.000|CC1|WORK HERE, BECAUSE IT ISN'T JUST
20110108024629.000|20110108024631.000|CC1|AS SIMPLE AS TAP WATER.         
20110108024631.000|20110108024632.000|CC1|>> IT ISN'T JUST WATER, ONLY 64%
20110108024632.000|20110108024634.000|CC1|OF THE COUNTRY HAS FLUORIDE IN  
20110108024634.000|20110108024635.000|CC1|THE WATER.                      
20110108024635.000|20110108024637.000|CC1|IT HAS TO DO WITH EVERYTHING    
20110108024637.000|20110108024638.000|CC1|ELSE WE PUT IN OUR KID'S MOUTHS.
20110108024638.000|20110108024639.000|CC1|THOSE RINSES, THE TOOTHPASTE,   
20110108024639.000|20110108024641.000|CC1|AND ALL THOSE TREATMENTS THAT   
20110108024641.000|20110108024643.000|CC1|THE DENTIST CAN GIVE.

20110108024646.000|20110108024648.000|CC1|BE EVERYWHERE.
